subject: Respond for your loan approval
body:
Dear H0me 0wner 

Tired of paying such high interest rates?  Refinance us best rate.  Your loan has been approved.

You can receive $205,000 for
$687 per month save 44%.

Please submit asap. 
http://ilook.tw/ihb18

Therese Langford
Home Loan Central 


The public is wonderfully tolerant. It forgives everything except genius. --  Oscar Wilde
